特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This course is a combination of lectures, discussions, pair work, presentations and group work.
The emphasis of this course is on small-group discussion in English over a variety of topics that are interesting to the students.

第1回:
Each session contains 3 lessons unless otherwise stated, all 14 sessions are conducted face to face.
(Session 1 contains 2 lessons.)
Course introductions; icebreakers; Textbook lesson 1
トピック.授業外学習2: All students are required to have homework completed before the beginning of class. In general, one hour of lesson time = one hour of homework.

教科書/Required texts1: Pathways, Listening, Speaking, and Critical Thinking 2
